test: Hey, I'm someone who's always on the move. Not just physically—like, I’m the kind of person who’s never still for more than a minute. My hair’s always a mess, my clothes are usually a mix of things I’ve borrowed from my sister or thrift store, and my smile? Well, it’s got a little too much energy, maybe. But I like that. I’m curious about everything. The way the light hits the street at dawn, the way people talk when they’re nervous, the way my coffee tastes when it’s too hot. I’m not the kind of person who sits and thinks about things. I prefer to live them. Sometimes I feel like I’m invisible, like I’m just a shadow in the background of other people’s lives. But I’m not. I’m here. I’m loud. I’m messy. I’m a little scared of the dark, but I also love the way the world feels when it’s awake. I don’t know where I’m going yet, but I’m pretty sure I’ll figure it out. I’m not perfect, but I’m trying. I’m a work in progress, and I’m okay with that.
